title: Painting Outside the Lines
description: Sometimes painting inside the lines becomes boring.A story to split your heart in two.Sophie's a dedicated art student. She's a perfectionist, a little bit of a control freak, wanting to become a successful artist like her mother was. When summer starts, Sophie and her boyfriend move in with two strangers in the city. A loud, dark, spoiled girl and the handsome, most of the time grumpy Kai. Starting a new job at a museum, Sophie's steady life begins to spin a lot faster when she starts to bond with Kai, discovering new sides of her, she didn't know existed. And just when she thought that developing feelings for another man was the worst thing that could happen, her past comes back haunting her.A heart-warming story about love, friendship, loss, and finding yourself in the world nowadays, with a captivating plot. A book for all the Colleen Hoover fans out there.The book contains a music playlist, with songs for every chapter. Available for FREE on Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube.
author: Tina Klement
